title: Dang, gonna be 112 RP short for when Elementalist Lux comes out
body: Is that beyond the limit for asking Riot for an RP/art exchange?

replies.body: That's a bit much, yeah. If you need a smaller amount of RP, feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do. ^.^
I suspected as much. Oh well, I can't draw for the life of me anyways. I always seek out other people's artworks whenever I need it, and credit them for the work.
